typeSystemDescription.name: hw1-yuerany-base-typesystem
typeSystemDescription.description: basic elements that extend UIMA's data types to provide implementation independent abstract data types for use in other typesystems

typeDescription.name: base.BaseAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Holds information about the annotator or other program which produced this annotation

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The annotator which produced this annotation ex: 'stanford.nlp.tokenizer'

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence of this annotation. Confidence is a number between 0 and 1 inclusive. A gold annotator or file IO produce a confidence of 1.
